workshop.title: Getting Started with Oracle Big Data Service
workshop.description: Use Oracle SQL to query data across your data lake.

labs.title: Copy Hadoop Data to Object Store
labs.description: Copy data that is in your Hadoop cluster to Oracle Object Storage.

labs.title: Backup Your Hadoop Cluster to Oracle Object Storage
labs.description: Backup data that is in your Hadoop to Oracle Object Storage.

labs.title: Restore Your Hadoop Cluster from Oracle Object Storage
labs.description: Restore your Haddop Cluster from a Backup on Oracle Object Storage.

labs.title: Set up Access to a BDS Node Using a Public IP
labs.description: Steps required to make your Big Data Service node available using a public IP Address

labs.title: Creating a Hadoop Admin User
labs.description: Describes how to add an admin user to a secure Big Data Service cluster
